name: Desire Media
overview:
Our services include development of Basic Corporate Identity Style or any of its elements:

Logo Design Letterhead & Envelop Design Brochure & Catalog Design Business Card Design Calendar & Poster Design Flex & Flyers Manuals & Magazines Advertisements & Posters Promotional material & Publications Calendars

Desire Media develops the following in the 3D environment : Animated Commercials Architectural images and walk-throughs 3D Architecture Designs Medical Animations Special Effects for videos and films Character Design and animation 3D Models & 3D Modeling Product modeling and animation Engineering modelling Logo and title animation Corporate mascots Show packaging 3D Animation Videos

Desire media offers a broad spectrum of advertisement design services:

Print media ads Webmercials Video commercials Flash ads Animated and Flash banner design Animation videos Flash promotion sequences
